m_szDocTitle: Toyota taking orders for Mirai fuel cell vehicle in U.S.
m_szDocSumamry: FacebookEmail Twitter Google+ LinkedIn Pinterest Toyota taking orders for Mirai fuel cell vehicle in U.S. More hydrogen stations are being built as Toyota prepares to sell the Mirai fuel cell vehicle in the U.S. this fall.
